interpretation:
The "relieved face" emoji is a symbol of calmness and peace after a period of worry or anxiety. This card indicates that a burden has been lifted, and a sense of relief has taken over. The individual represented by this emoji is content, satisfied, and at ease. It is a reminder to take a deep breath and let go of any tension or stress. Trust that things will work out, and it is time to relax and enjoy the present moment. 

In a reading, this card could suggest that a situation that has been causing stress or anxiety is coming to an end, and the individual can now enjoy a sense of relief and freedom. It can also indicate a need to take a break and prioritize self-care and relaxation.
